text: Hilary Duff's New York City neighbor has threatened legal action after she called him out for allegedly keeping her up by'smoking cigarettes and weed all night long '. Dieter Addison is lawyering up, according to Page Six on Wednesday, following Duff's Instagram rant on Tuesday night. Dieter spoke to the website by phone, saying he doesn't smoke pot and he actually lives full - time with a sober companion in the upmarket Soho neighborhood of Manhattan.
